name: Gnome Soup
description:
Parkour your way around the world as a gnome, collecting mushrooms for your sickly wife!

To watch the two live action cutscenes, press P when prompted. (First and last level)

The cutscenes didn't export properly! Please watch them here instead.



Mechanics:

You can wall climb, wall run and slide. You can jump to interrupt any movement, and slide jumping gives you a significant forward boost.

You can throw boots to collect blue mushrooms, or walk into them manually.

If you somehow get stuck (which has never happened to me as the dev) you can press R to respawn.

Post your final time + thoughts down below!

Final time is after you loop back to the first level. Sorry the timer doesn't stop, I ran out of time to code it ;)

This game was made in one week by one person, for the 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam.

Gnome Soup uses photoscanned 3D assets for the entirety of its 3D models. The majority of these were scanned on UNC Chapel Hill's campus, only two were downloaded externally. (The wheelbarrow and mushroom)

All credits are given in game.
